remarks: Ordering law for orthocomplement.  (Contributed by NM, 9-Mar-2015.)
statement:
doch11.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
doch11.i $e |- I = ( ( DIsoH ` K ) ` W ) $.
doch11.o $e |- ._|_ = ( ( ocH ` K ) ` W ) $.
doch11.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
doch11.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. ran I ) $.
doch11.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. ran I ) $.
dochord3 $p |- ( ph -> ( X C_ ( ._|_ ` Y ) <-> Y C_ ( ._|_ ` X ) ) ) $.
